alert.note: Alert for Cuyahoga (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Lake Effect Snow Warning issued November 28 at 10:09AM EST until November 29 at 12:00AM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...LAKE EFFECT SNOW WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT EST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow occurring. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph, especially closer to the lakeshore. * WHERE...Cuyahoga county. * WHEN...Until midnight EST tonight. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Lake effect snow continues is expected to continue through much of Cuyahoga County through early this afternoon. There should be a lull in snow early this afternoon through mid afternoon before another band of snow develops on the east side later this evening.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
